Package toxi.sim.erosion


Class Summary
ErosionFunction Abstract parent class for various 2D erosion simulations, implemented as sub-classes.
TalusAngleErosion For each neighbour it's computed the difference between the processed cell and the neighbour:
ThermalErosion Applies thermal erosion to the given elevation data.
